Aarshaveda Wellness

Demystifying Ayurveda
Sobre nosotros
A Y U R V E D A - T H E S C I E N C E O F H A R M O N Y Ayurveda above all is the Science of Harmony a balance of mind-body and spirit. Simply put Ayurveda believes that if the mind-body and spirit are off-balance, disease creeps in. Achieving balance is, therefore, the ultimate goal of Ayurvedic healing. M I S S I O N “We cannot change the world we live in and take it back to earlier, less stressful times when peace was the rule and not the exception. Since this is a reality, it is clearly time to adopt a lifestyle that permits us to survive and find Health and Peace. This lifestyle is the Ayurveda Way of Life” A B O U T U S Aarshaveda Wellness is the third generation startup with a vision to integrate the heritage and the digital intelligence of modern healthcare into an actionable re-position of Ayurveda in the 21st-century context. We've been in business since 2015 and mainly focussing on the export of Ayurveda Products manufactured in the most authentic manner and also into New age Ayurveda products which are user-friendly and effective, derived from authentic and classical texts of Ayurveda. H E R I T A G E & E X P E R I E N C E Apart from a legendary seven decades-long service in the Ayurvedic healthcare industry globally, with a portfolio of 500+ classical medicines and 100+ proprietary Ayurvedic formulations, Aarshaveda is a natural torchbearer of the lineage, under the leadership of Mr. Venkatesh Anilkumar, grandson of Ayurveda Acharya Vaidyan KGK Panicker (Kollasseril Govindan Kunju Panicker), a doyen in the field of Ayurveda, who founded Kerala Ayurveda Limited in 1945 at Aluva, Kochi, with a mission to promote the richness of Ayurveda tradition by providing quality products and services.
